caseTitle: Association for the Welfare of Owner & Staff of Qingqi v. Province of Sindh and others
tagline: The State is required to ensure that all public transport vehicles including Qingqi Rickshaws are those which are constructed and manufactured by duly authorized constructors and manufacturers according to the legally specified design, specifications and standards and further ensure that they are fit to ply on roads and are registered with the sanctioned route permit with specified route driven by duly licensed driver.
